title: Febreze Fun Facts
author: Unknown
pages:
Febreze Fun Facts

1.The name Febreze is
a combination of
"fabric" and "breeze"

2. The name is an
example of the
Mandela effect. People
say they remeber the
name being spelled
"Febreeze" with two
e's.
3. The mist is safe
around most
household pets.
However, the label
states that it's
dangerous to birds.

4. It was initially
marketed to dispel
unpleasent smells.
However, most people
had become
ascustomed to their
smell of their own
home. To drive sales,
they began to market
it as a way to make
things smell pleasant.

5, The active
ingredient in most
Febreze products is
hydroxypropyl
beta-cyclodextrin.



6. The mist can kill any
demon you use it on,
even gods!
